channel.title: Looking to put server online but i am not on a router
channel.description:
i have been working on my 317 client (Global Gods) for about 8 months now and am ready to put it online but i need help with doing so if someone could help me on this matter it would be great someone please give me some feed back
when i go to my web browser and type in 192.168.1.1 it brings me there but i cant set up i am not at my home address but want my server online is there anyway i could have the source on this labtop and host it i got a wifi connection got no-ip what else? i went to portforward.com and it scanned my ports i enter 43594 and it said that my ports are not open and unreachable ive never had this problem yet again never ran a server from a labtop

item.title: Looking to put server online but i am not on a router
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

yea tried that i got into the router the first day that i was here than i went into my cmd prompt and did
ipconfig/release
ipconfig/renew
and now im unable to access the linksys router
model = BEFW11S4 V4
ill try the firewall thing thank you ill get back to you when i do.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking to put server online but i am not on a router

item.title: Looking to put server online but i am not on a router
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Try the following and see if it worked.

Disable Your firewall, OR add an exception for Java and for the port you’re running your server on.

Check if you certain that you don’t have a router.
Open a command shell and type

ipconfig /all

Then write down the standard gateway (most likely yours is 192.168.1.254).
Now open a webbrowser and type the standard gateway in the url.

You should also assign a static ip, http://www.tech-faq.com/how-to-set-a-static-ip-address-in-windows.html

Read full topic
item.source: Looking to put server online but i am not on a router
